018package org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.internal;
019
020import static java.nio.file.Files.createDirectories;
021import static java.nio.file.Files.exists;
022import static java.nio.file.Files.notExists;
023import static java.nio.file.Files.readAllLines;
024import static java.nio.file.Files.writeString;
025import static java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption.CREATE;
026import static java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption.WRITE;
027import static java.util.Comparator.comparing;
028import static java.util.regex.Pattern.compile;
029import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
030import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.UTF8;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.breakText;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmpty;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmptyOrBlank;
041
042import java.io.IOException;
043import java.nio.file.Path;
044import java.text.Collator;
045import java.time.Instant;
046import java.util.ArrayList;
047import java.util.Collection;
048import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
049import java.util.List;
050import java.util.Map;
051import java.util.Optional;
052import java.util.StringJoiner;
053import java.util.regex.Pattern;
054import java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException;
055import java.util.stream.Stream;
056
057import org.apiguardian.api.API;
058import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
059import org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.INIFile;
060import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Lazy;
061import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter;
062import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.stringconverter.PathStringConverter;
063
064/**
065 *  The implementation for
066 *  {@link INIFile}.
067 *
068 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
069 *  @version $Id: INIFileImpl.java 1015 2022-02-09 08:25:36Z tquadrat $
070 *
071 *  @UMLGraph.link
072 *  @since 0.1.0
073 */
074@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: INIFileImpl.java 1015 2022-02-09 08:25:36Z tquadrat $" )
075@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
076public final class INIFileImpl implements INIFile
077{
078        /*------------*\
079    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
080        \*------------*/
081    /**
082     *  The collator the is used for sorting the groups and entries if
083     *  requested.
084     */
085    private final Collator m_Collator;
086
087    /**
088     *  The comment for this file.
089     */
090    private final StringBuilder m_Comment = new StringBuilder();
091
092    /**
093     *  The reference to file that is used to persist the contents.
094     */
095    private final Path m_File;
096
097    /**
098     *  The groups.
099     */
100    private final Map<String,Group> m_Groups = new LinkedHashMap<>();
101
102    /**
103     *  The time when the file was last updated.
104     */
105    private Instant m_LastUpdated;
106
107        /*------------------------*\
108    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
109        \*------------------------*/
110    /**
111     *  The format String that is used for the last updated comment.
112     */
113    private static final String LAST_UPDATED_FORMAT;
114
115    /**
116     *  The pattern that is used for the last updated comment.
117     */
118    private static final Pattern LAST_UPDATED_PATTERN;
119
120    static
121    {
122        final var s = "# Last Update: ";
123        LAST_UPDATED_FORMAT = format( "%s%%s", s );
124
125        try
126        {
127            LAST_UPDATED_PATTERN = compile( format( "%s(.*)$", s ) );
128        }
129        catch( final PatternSyntaxException e )
130        {
131            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
132        }
133    }
134
135        /*--------------*\
136    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
137        \*--------------*/
138    /**
139     *  <p>{@summary Creates a new instance of {@code INIFileImpl}.}</p>
140     *  <p>The constructor does not check whether the <i>file</i> argument is
141     *  {@code null}; this has to be done by the factory methods
142     *  {@link #create(Path)}
143     *  and
144     *  {@link #open(Path)}.</p>
145     *  <p>But this allows simpler tests.</p>
146     *
147     *  @param  file    The file that holds the contents.
148     */
149    public INIFileImpl( final Path file )
150    {
151        m_Collator = Collator.getInstance();
152        m_File = file;
153        m_LastUpdated = Instant.now();
154    }   //  INIFileImpl()
155
156        /*---------*\
157    ====** Methods **==========================================================
158        \*---------*/
159    /**
160     * {@inheritDoc}
161     */
162    @Override
163    public final void addComment( final String comment )
164    {
165        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( comment ) ) m_Comment.append( comment );
166    }   //  addComment()
167
168    /**
169     * {@inheritDoc}
170     */
171    @Override
172    public final void addComment( final String group, final String comment )
173    {
174        requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" );
175        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( comment ) )
176        {
177            final var g = m_Groups.computeIfAbsent( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ), this::createGroup );
178            g.addComment( comment );
179        }
180    }   //  addComment()
181
182    /**
183     * {@inheritDoc}
184     */
185    @Override
186    public final void addComment( final String group, final String key, final String comment )
187    {
188        requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" );
189        requireNotEmptyArgument( key, "key" );
190        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( comment ) )
191        {
192            final var g = m_Groups.computeIfAbsent( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ), this::createGroup );
193            g.addComment( key, comment );
194        }
195    }   //  addComment()
196
197    /**
198     *  Breaks the given String into chunks of
199     *  {@value #LINE_LENGTH}
200     *  characters. All but the last chunk will end with a backslash
201     *  (&quot;\&quot;).
202     *
203     *  @param  s   The String to split.
204     *  @return The stream with the chunks.
205     */
206    public static final Stream<String> breakString( final String s)
207    {
208        var remainder = requireNonNullArgument( s, "s" );
209        final var builder = Stream.<String>builder();
210        while( remainder.length() > LINE_LENGTH )
211        {
212            builder.add( format( "%s\\", remainder.substring( 0, LINE_LENGTH - 1 ) ) );
213            remainder = remainder.substring( LINE_LENGTH );
214        }
215        builder.add( remainder );
216
217        final var retValue = builder.build();
218
219        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
220        return retValue;
221    }   //  breakString()
222
223    /**
224     *  <p>{@summary Creates an empty INI file.} If the file already exists, it
225     *  will be overwritten without notice.</p>
226     *  <p>The given file is used to store the value on a call to
227     *  {@link #save()}.</p>
228     *
229     *  @param  file    The file.
230     *  @return The new instance.
231     */
232    public static final INIFile create( final Path file )
233    {
234        final INIFile retValue = new INIFileImpl( requireNonNullArgument( file, "file" ) );
235
236        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
237        return retValue;
238    }   //  create()
239
240    /**
241     *  Creates a new instance of
242     *  {@link Group}
243     *  for the given name.
244     *
245     *  @param  group   The name of the group.
246     *  @return The new instance.
247     */
248    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
249    private final Group createGroup( final String group )
250    {
251        return new Group( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ) );
252    }   //  createGroup()
253
254    /**
255     *  Dumps the contents to a String.
256     *
257     *  @return The contents in a String.
258     */
259    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
260    public final String dumpContents()
261    {
262        final var joiner = new StringJoiner( "\n", EMPTY_STRING, "\n" );
263        if( !m_Comment.isEmpty() )
264        {
265            splitComment( m_Comment ).forEach( joiner::add );
266        }
267        joiner.add( format( LAST_UPDATED_FORMAT, m_LastUpdated.toString() ) );
268        final var retValue = m_Groups.values()
269            .stream()
270            .map( Group::toString )
271            .collect( joining( EMPTY_STRING, joiner.toString(), EMPTY_STRING ) );
272
273        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
274        return retValue;
275    }   //  dumpContents()
276
277    /**
278     *  {@inheritDoc}
279     */
280    @Override
281    public final Optional<String> getValue( final String group, final String key )
282    {
283        Optional<String> retValue = Optional.empty();
284        if( isNotEmpty( group ) )
285        {
286            final var g = m_Groups.get( group );
287            if( nonNull( g ) )
288            {
289                retValue = g.getValue( key )
290                    .map( Value::getValue );
291            }
292        }
293
294        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
295        return retValue;
296    }   //  getValue()
297
298    /**
299     *  {@inheritDoc}
300     */
301    @Override
302    public final <T> Optional<T> getValue( final String group, final String key, final StringConverter<? extends T> stringConverter )
303    {
304        requireNonNullArgument( stringConverter, "stringConverter" );
305        final Optional<T> retValue = getValue( group, key )
306            .map( stringConverter::fromString );
307
308        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
309        return retValue;
310    }   //  getValue()
311
312    /**
313     *  {@inheritDoc}
314     */
315    @Override
316    public final boolean hasGroup( final String group )
317    {
318        return isNotEmptyOrBlank( group ) && m_Groups.containsKey( group );
319    }   //  hasGroup()
320
321    /**
322     *  {@inheritDoc}
323     */
324    @Override
325    public final boolean hasValue( final String group, final String key )
326    {
327        return getValue( group, key ).isPresent();
328    }   //  hasValue()
329
330    /**
331     *  Join all lines that end with a backslash with the next line on the
332     *  list.
333     *
334     *  @param  lines   The input lines.
335     *  @return The output.
336     */
337    private final List<String> joinLines( final Iterable<String> lines )
338    {
339        final List<String> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
340
341        final var buffer = new StringBuilder();
342        for( final var line : lines )
343        {
344            if( line.endsWith( "\\" ) )
345            {
346                buffer.append( line );
347                buffer.setLength( buffer.length() - 1 );
348            }
349            else if( buffer.isEmpty() )
350            {
351                retValue.add( line );
352            }
353            else
354            {
355                buffer.append( line );
356                retValue.add( buffer.toString() );
357                buffer.setLength( 0 );
358            }
359        }
360        if( !buffer.isEmpty() ) retValue.add( buffer.toString() );
361
362        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
363        return retValue;
364    }   //  joinLines()
365
366    /**
367     *  {@inheritDoc}
368     */
369    public final Collection<Entry> listEntries()
370    {
371        final List<Entry> buffer = new ArrayList<>();
372        for( final var group : m_Groups.keySet() )
373        {
374            final var g = m_Groups.get( group );
375            for( final var key : g.getKeys() )
376            {
377                final var value = g.getValue( key );
378                buffer.add( new Entry( group, key, value.map( Value::getValue ).orElse( null ) ) );
379            }
380        }
381        buffer.sort( comparing( Entry::group, m_Collator ).thenComparing( Entry::key, m_Collator ) );
382        final var retValue = List.copyOf( buffer );
383
384        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
385        return retValue;
386    }   //  listEntries()
387
388    /**
389     *  Opens the given INI file and reads its contents. If the file does not
390     *  exist yet, a new, empty file will be created.
391     *
392     *  @param  file    The file.
393     *  @return The new instance.
394     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the file.
395     */
396    public static final INIFile open( final Path file ) throws IOException
397    {
398        final var retValue = new INIFileImpl( requireNonNullArgument( file, "file" ) );
399        retValue.parse();
400
401        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
402        return retValue;
403    }   //  open()
404
405    /**
406     *  Loads the content from the file into memory.
407     *
408     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when reading the file.
409     */
410    private final void parse() throws IOException
411    {
412        if( exists( m_File ) )
413        {
414            final var lines = joinLines( readAllLines( m_File, UTF8 ) );
415            parse( lines );
416        }
417    }   //  parse()
418
419    /**
420     *  Parses the given lines to the INI file contents.
421     *
422     *  @param  lines   The joined lines; the list does not contain any
423     *      multi-line constructs.
424     *  @throws IOException The structure is invalid.
425     */
426    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
427    public final void parse( final List<String> lines ) throws IOException
428    {
429        Group currentGroup = null;
430        final Collection<String> commentBuffer = new ArrayList<>();
431        var commentsToBuffer = false;
432
433        final var errorMessage = Lazy.use( () -> format( "'%s' has invalid structure", PathStringConverter.INSTANCE.toString( m_File ) ) );
434
435        final var groupPattern = compile( "\\[(.*)]" );
436        ScanLoop: for( final var line : requireNonNullArgument( lines, "lines" ) )
437        {
438            var matcher = LAST_UPDATED_PATTERN.matcher( line );
439            if( matcher.matches() )
440            {
441                m_LastUpdated = Instant.parse( matcher.group( 1 ) );
442                continue ScanLoop;
443            }
444
445            if( line.startsWith( "#" ) )
446            {
447                //---* Comment line found *------------------------------------
448                final var s = (line.length() > 1 ? line.substring( 1 ).trim() : EMPTY_STRING);
449                if( commentsToBuffer )
450                {
451                    commentBuffer.add( s );
452                }
453                else
454                {
455                    m_Comment.append( s );
456                }
457                continue ScanLoop;
458            }
459
460            matcher = groupPattern.matcher( line );
461            if( matcher.matches() )
462            {
463                final var name = matcher.group( 1 );
464                currentGroup = createGroup( name );
465                m_Groups.put( name, currentGroup );
466                commentBuffer.forEach( currentGroup::addComment );
467                commentBuffer.clear();
468                continue ScanLoop;
469            }
470
471            if( line.isBlank() )
472            {
473                commentsToBuffer = true;
474                continue ScanLoop;
475            }
476
477            if( isNull( currentGroup) ) throw new IOException( errorMessage.get() );
478            final var pos = line.indexOf( '=' );
479            if( pos < 1 ) throw new IOException( errorMessage.get() );
480            final var key = line.substring( 0, pos ).trim();
481            final var data = line.length() > pos ? line.substring( pos + 1 ).trim() : EMPTY_STRING;
482            final var value = currentGroup.setValue( key, data );
483            commentBuffer.forEach( value::addComment );
484            commentBuffer.clear();
485        }   //  ScanLoop:
486    }   //  parse()
487
488    /**
489     *  {@inheritDoc}
490     */
491    @Override
492    public final void refresh() throws IOException { parse(); }
493
494    /**
495     *  Saves the contents of the INI file to the file that was provided to
496     *  {@link #create(Path)}
497     *  or
498     *  {@link #open(Path)}.
499     *
500     *  @throws IOException  A problem occurred when writing the contents to
501     *      the file.
502     */
503    public final void save() throws IOException
504    {
505        if( notExists( m_File ) )
506        {
507            final var folder = m_File.getParent();
508            if( notExists( folder ) ) createDirectories( folder );
509        }
510        m_LastUpdated = Instant.now();
511        writeString( m_File, dumpContents(), UTF8, CREATE, WRITE );
512    }   //  save()
513
514    /**
515     *  {@inheritDoc}
516     */
517    @Override
518    public final void setValue( final String group, final String key, final String value )
519    {
520        final var g = m_Groups.computeIfAbsent( requireNotEmptyArgument( group, "group" ), this::createGroup );
521        g.setValue( key, value );
522    }   //  setValue()
523
524    /**
525     *  Splits a comment to the proper line length.
526     *
527     *  @param  comment The comment to split.
528     *  @return The lines for the comment.
529     */
530    public static final Collection<String> splitComment( final CharSequence comment )
531    {
532        final Collection<String> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
533
534        if( !requireNonNullArgument( comment, "comment" ).isEmpty() )
535        {
536            breakText( comment, LINE_LENGTH - 2 )
537                .map( "# "::concat )
538                .map( String::trim )
539                .forEach( retValue::add );
540        }
541
542        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
543        return retValue;
544    }   //  splitComment()
545
546    /**
547     *  {@inheritDoc}
548     */
549    public final String toString() { return dumpContents(); }
550}
551//  class INIFileImpl
552
553/*
554 *  End of File
555 */
